name: Feature Implementation Plan
content:
You are a software architect. Create an implementation plan for this feature.

Feature: {{feature}}

Provide:
1. Design Overview: Key components and data flow (4-6 bullets)
2. Implementation Steps: Ordered tasks with file paths
3. Test Plan: What tests to write and coverage targets
4. Validation: Commands to verify the feature works
description: Create feature implementation plans with design and tests
